body: Ashish, Sorry for being late to the conversation and I'm glad that you and Abraham were mostly able to figure out how to use the LBNL WINDOW component.  There were just a couple of things wrong in that you were assigning a window material to an opaque HBSrf.  This should be what you need to do to assign the glass correctly: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/YspO*YmPsuF5z-Rq*wmOjunedqwmQEnuXiC2H0FI3hnHCYv4c7A9JUwqDNMWdikHZnCewInPOCMIU4sSGq2FzkIsIeGaa4zI/CorrectWINDOW.JPG) -Chris
